exceptions.tactic: assert (H : opp (plus (mult x y) (mult x y)) = zero).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : closed x The term "x" has type "T -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Ring.sort ?K".
Found no subterm matching "zero" in the current goal.
The LHS of mult_distr_l (mult _ (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

exceptions.tactic: assert (H' : plus (mult x y) (mult x (opp y)) = zero).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : closed x X : ?G X3 : ?G5 H : forall x0 : ?G2, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H1 : forall x0 y0 z : ?K2, mult x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (mult x0 y0) (mult x0 z) X4 : ?G9 H0 : forall x0 : ?G6, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero The term "x" has type "T -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Ring.sort ?K3".

exceptions.tactic: apply plus_reg_r with (r := mult x y).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : closed x X : ?G X3 : ?G5 H : forall x0 : ?G2, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H1 : forall x0 y0 z : ?K2, mult x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (mult x0 y0) (mult x0 z) X4 : ?G9 H0 : forall x0 : ?G6, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H3 : forall x0 y0 z : ?K4, mult x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (mult x0 y0) (mult x0 z) X5 : ?G13 H2 : forall x0 : ?G10, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero The term "x" has type "T -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Ring.sort ?K5".
Found no subterm matching "zero" in the current goal.

original: intros x y. assert (H : opp (plus (mult x y) (mult x y)) = zero). - rewrite <- plus_opp_r. auto. rewrite mult_distr_l in H. assert (H' : plus (mult x y) (mult x (opp y)) = zero). -- apply plus_reg_r with (r := mult x y). rewrite <- H, plus_comm. auto. apply plus_reg_r with (r := mult x (opp y)) in H'.
